title: We Should be able to Mix and Match Parts of Chromas we Own
body: There should be an option to mix chromas if you own multiple for 1 skin. An example would be the new Battle Professor Graves skin. His hair changes color, his clothes change color, and his gun changes color. If I own a chroma where his hair is black and one where his hair is white, I should be able to choose which hair color I want. Obviously this wouldn't work for all skins with chromas (Like Zac who is primarily 1 color), but It would be a cool new feature that would definitely sell more Chromas.

replies.body: It would be a technical nightmare that would likely require a lot more work under the hood that you expect, and cater to a very small number of players - it would be neat, but dont count on it ever happening.
I don't agree that it would cater to a small number of players. I think they would sell like crazy to a large portion of the playerbase that already buys skins
I mean I get what you're saying but LoL isn't Sims so no need to go that much into detail.
